issue.title: [Java] NullVector field name can't be set
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11382](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11382). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the Java NullVector has a default Field name fixed to DATA_VECTOR_NAME, which is "$data$". This should be able to be changed by the user, probably by having an alternate constructor that accepts a name.
